subject: Re: [junit] No tests found in  my   testcase  unable to understand why ?
msgSnippet: Your test cases should not accept parameters. Use public void testgetStatus() instead of public void testgetStatus( Long storageRequestId)  Regards, Jan
messageBody:
Your test cases should not accept parameters.

Use
public void testgetStatus()
instead of
public void testgetStatus( Long storageRequestId) 

Regards, Jan
 



----- Original Message ----
From: miro <miroconnect@...>
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, 2 September, 2008 19:35:21
Subject: [junit] No tests found in my testcase unable to understand why ?



Here is my test case

import com.uprr.app. csr.dao.hibernat e.impl.BaseDAOTe stCase;

assertEquals( "true", "true");

}

}

}

tests found in com.uprr.app. csr.manager. StorageRequestMa nagerTest
